question_content.description:
### Problem09

Combinational circuits' output values _____(0)\___ (only/not-only) depend on their input values.

As with all circuits, each gate is within a small box and is built with _____(1)\___ _____(2)\___ (which reach to the edge of the box), _____(3)\___ _____(4)\___ (which extend past the edge of the box) and _____(5)\___, all connected together by other wires (literally from sec-7.3)

*Excerpt From Computer Science Sedgewick, Robert,Wayne, Kevin. This material may be protected by copyright.*
question_content.author: Beilong Tang
